sentences.sContent: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
sentences.sCn: 油经过提炼去除天然生成的杂质。

sentences.sContent: Surgical techniques are constantly being refined.
sentences.sCn: 外科手术技术正在不断得到完善。

words.tran: [油气][化工][冶] 精炼的；精确的；微妙的；有教养的
精制；文雅；[化工][油气][冶] 提纯

trans.tranOther: When a substance is refined, it is made pure by having all other substances removed from it
